name: Sabine Timpf
content: Prof. Dr. Sabine Timpf Geoinformatics University Faculties Faculty of Applied Computer Science Institute of Geography Chairs and Professors Geoinformatics Team Prof. Dr. Sabine Timpf Prof. Dr. Sabine Timpf Professor for Geoinformatics Geoinformatics Phone: +49 821 598 2313 Email: sabine.timpf@geo.uni-augsburggeo.uni-augsburg.de () Room: 2022 (B) Open hours: Appointment via e-mail, WiSe 26/27: Tue 4-5pm Address: Alter Postweg 118, 86159 Augsburg Contact (.vcf) Further Information Visiting hours: Please contact me via Email or come to my office Tuesdays between 4 and 5pm (WiSe 2025/26). Outside of semester teaching times, please contact me via Email. Portfolios: Please send your Portfolio to me via Email. You will receive the signed copy back also via Email. Please make sure that you use your UniA student email address and that you have filled out all required fields in the Portfolio. Research Foci spatial cognition in geo-spatial activities (wayfinding and navigation, landscape planning) geospatial artic´ficial intelligence (GeoAI) enabling smart mobility using information technology urban intelligent (and complex) systems agent-based modelling and simulation 3D models of urban environments Courses / Teaching If you are interested in researching and writing a Bachelor's or Master's thesis with me, then please check out our teaching pages.
